meanings: Something that festers is bound to burst

vlive.korean: 고마워요 언니 - 터지는 거 아니에요? Thank you. - Isn't it going to blow up? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🐱🐹🐿🦋🍞🐰
vlive.english: Thank you. - Isn't it going to blow up?

vlive.korean: 그거 안 터지는... 어떻게 하지? How should I... How? 듣기 View video OUI ENTERTAINMENT : [#YO_LIVE]요한이를 바라봄🌼
과즙 터지는 소리 들리세요? Do you hear the crunching sounds? 듣기 View video OSEN : IZ*ONE 아이즈원 안유진X강혜원, 진정한 입덕요정들 #스타로드 하이라이트5
vlive.english: Do you hear the crunching sounds?

vlive.korean: 그거 진짜 폭탄 터지는 소리 들려서... It made a lot of noises like an exploding bomb. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : 켠셰프의 쿸쿸 with 주허니 #8
vlive.english: It made a lot of noises like an exploding bomb.

vlive.korean: [여기저기 터지는] 한 번만 더 해봐도 돼요, 한 번만? [Everyone keeps saying] Can we try one more time? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.8
vlive.english: [Everyone keeps saying] Can we try one more time?

examples.korean: staccato bursts of gunfire 발음듣기 짧고 날카롭게 터지는 포격 소리 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

Do not judge men by mere appearances; for the light laughter that bubbles on the lip often mantles over the depths of sadness, and the serious look may be the sober veil that covers a divine peace and joy. (Edward Chapin) 발음듣기 단순히 외모로 사람을 평가하지 말라. 입술에서 터지는 가벼운 웃음은 종종 깊은 슬픔을 감추고, 심각한 표정은 신성한 평화와 기쁨을 가리는 수수한 베일일 수 있기 때문이다. (에드워드 채핀, 행복명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Do not judge men by mere appearances; for the light laughter that bubbles on the lip often mantles over the depths of sadness, and the serious look may be the sober veil that covers a divine peace and joy. (Edward Chapin) 발음

examples.korean: tears/gales/peals/shrieks of laughter 발음듣기 눈물이 날 정도로 웃음/귀가 멍멍할 정도로 큰 웃음소리/와 하고 터지는 웃음소리/날카로운 웃음소리 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
She could hear the distant sound of fireworks exploding. 발음듣기 그녀는 멀리에서 들려오는 폭죽이 터지는 소리를 들을 수 있었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She could hear the distant sound of fireworks exploding. 발음

examples.korean: The terrorists were killed when their bomb detonated unexpectedly. 발음듣기 테러리스트들은 자기들이 설치한 폭탄이 예기치 않게 터지는 바람에 사망했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The terrorists were killed when their bomb detonated unexpectedly. 발음
